com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment

Class DynamicSimpleTutorialFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment.DynamicTutorialFragment
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment.DynamicSimpleTutorialFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, DynamicTutorial

    public class DynamicSimpleTutorialFragment
extends DynamicTutorialFragment
    A DynamicTutorialFragment fragment with an image, title, subtitle and description which will be used with the DynamicTutorialActivity.

      • onBackgroundColorChanged

        public void onBackgroundColorChanged(int color)
        Description copied from interface: DynamicTutorial
        This method will be called when there is a change in the background color of the activity.

        Implement this method to update any views during the transition.
